articles.title: Applications open for Legatum Center Fellowship
articles.metaDescription: The Legatum Center for Development and Entrepreneurship at MIT has opened applications for the 2021-22 Legatum Fellowship.

articles.title: The impact of philanthropic capital in the anti-slavery space
articles.metaDescription: Over the last decade, the Freedom Fund has developed a model of philanthropy that has shown to be highly impactful in the anti-slavery space.

articles.title: World NTD Day: Volunteering for Change
articles.metaDescription: On 30th January 2021, we celebrate World NTD Day, a new milestone in the fight to control and eliminate NTDs.

articles.title: GB News starts hiring, announces senior appointments
articles.metaDescription: GB News launches a national recruitment drive to employ 140 people nationwide as it begins building Britain’s biggest new news channel in 30 years.

articles.title: World NTD Day: Tracing the roots
articles.metaDescription: In the lead up to World NTD Day, we join our partners in showing the world our solidarity and collective action to #BeatNTDs and #EndTheNeglect.

articles.title: Investors give go-ahead for GB News
articles.metaDescription: GB News has finalised its investment to launch a boldly different 24-hour television and digital news service to bring more choice to British viewers.

articles.title: Legatum Institute develops holistic impact assessment tool to inform Government's Covid-19 responses
articles.metaDescription: The framework is based on the methodology of the Legatum Prosperity Index, which analyses the drivers of prosperity around the world.

articles.title: Legatum Institute launches the 14th edition of the Legatum Prosperity Index

metaImage.title: The Legatum Institute's 2020 Legatum Prosperity Index

articles.metaDescription: The Legatum Prosperity Index is the only global index that measures national prosperity based on institutional, economic, and social wellbeing.

articles.title: My visit to Luminos classrooms in Liberia

metaImage.title: Mish and Abba in Varneys classroom 1 980x639

articles.metaDescription: Impact and Insight: Michel Al-Moumen visits a Luminos Classrooms in Liberia

articles.title: Towards an Ethical Corporate Governance in Russia and South Korea - Who, If Not You?
articles.metaDescription: The principles of good governance are at the heart of Legatum’s ethical framework in all its incarnations.

articles.title: Introducing the Freedom Fund's Hotspot Model
articles.metaDescription: This video outlines how the Freedom Fund’s hotspot model is empowering local frontline organisations to end modern slavery
